meta.title: From TUMBLE to WEED
meta.author: Sandy Weisz and Mao Reynolds
meta.message: It’s finally feeling like fall! This week the Raddles are all related to fall — or rather, "fall". Today we tumble with the tumbleweeds, that staple of film Westerns. Every Christmas, the city of Chandler, Arizona celebrates not with an evergreen tree but a “tree” made of tumbleweeds.

ladder.clue: Change one letter in <> to get a dating app
What a <> might do to you
Reverse <> and add a letter to get a beloved sci-fi character
Change the double vowel in <> to a different double vowel to get something grassy
